name: Ask you About me
description:
Ask you About me is a question answering game in which the players create the questions by choosing both of their halves and merging them

The game is designed as an icebreaker for parties but can also be played by just two players

Ask you About me features more than 80 unique question combinations

How to play:

1. Choose the number of players at the starting screen to change the type of questions that will appear

2. Swipe the cards on your turn to view the possible options for the first or second half of the question

3. When you want to make your choice tap the other card and pass the phone to the next player

4. When a question is formed both players who created it answer it and then pass the phone to the next player

You can make any adjustments you want to have the most fun

You can get the game from the Play Store link or download the apk below

You can NOT redistribute this game

Check out some other games here

Follow GG Undroid Games on Twitter

Thank you for playing!
